name: connect-uoft
description: To run a local version, navigate to the `sprint1/connect-uoft-frontend` folder  in your terminal and run `npm install` then `npm start` (if you are using npm as a package manager)

scripts.setup: npm install && cd connect-uoft-frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build-run: cd connect-uoft-frontend && npm run build && cd .. && node server.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
